        public Game​(Player s0,
            Player s1,
            CollectoClient client)

        Requires

    • Method Detail

      • createNewBoard

        public void createNewBoard()
        Create a board that has at least 1 possible move.
        Ensures
        (this.getBoard().isStillPossibleSingleMove() == true);

      • update

        public void update()
        Prints the game situation.

      • winner

        public Player winner()
        Returns player who is winner or return null if no winner. This is the case when one has more score or if score is equal, one who has more balls is the winner
        Returns:
        a player who is the winner
        Ensures
        winner() != null when there is a winner

      • getCurrentTurn

        public int getCurrentTurn()
        Returns current turn of the game.
        Returns:
        this.current;
        Ensures
        (current == 0) || (current == 1);

      • updateCurrentTurn

        public void updateCurrentTurn()
        Update the current turn of the game.
        Requires
        (current == 0) || (current == 1);
        Ensures
        current == (1 - \old(current));

      • getBoard

        public Board getBoard()
        Returns current board of the game.
        Returns:
        a current board
        Ensures
        this.board != null

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer​(int role)
        Returns the player of the game.
        Parameters:
        role - - the turn of the player
        Returns:
        a player corresponding with role
        Requires
        (role == 1) or (role ==0);
        Ensures
        this.player[role] != null;

      • updateOnlineBoard

        public void updateOnlineBoard​(Board boardInput)
        Update board from server for online game.
        Parameters:
        boardInput - ;
        Requires
        (board != null);

      • makeOnlineMove

        public void makeOnlineMove​(int currentTurn)
        Make the move for online players.
        Parameters:
        currentTurn - - role of online player;
        Requires
        (board != null) and (players[currentTurn] != null);

      • startOfflineGame

        public void startOfflineGame()
        Starts the Collecto game.
        Asks after each ended game if the user want to continue. Continues until the user does not want to play anymore.

      • playOfflineGame

        public void playOfflineGame()
        Plays the Collecto game.
        The game is played until it is over. Players can make a move one after the other. After each move, the changed game situation is printed.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the game.
        The new board object is assigned and player[0] becomes the current player.
